data.title: DCC Annual Report: Fiscal Year 2022-23
data.excerpt:
As required by section 26190 of the Business and Professions Code and Item
1115-102-0001 of the Budget Act of 2022, the Department submits the
following information regarding its activities. This report contains the required
information and data for the prior fiscal year, July 1, 2022 to June 30, 2023.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
